newsitem.title: UK: European precious metals end firmer.
newsitem.headline: European precious metals end firmer.

text.p: GOLD - Closed at $327.80/$328.30 up $1.40. Boosted by further fund short covering overnight and on New York opening. Still faces potential problem clearing $330.00
SILVER - Finished at $4.36/$4.38 up nine cents.
PLATINUM - Also ended up at $417.50/$420.50, up $6.00. Concerned about fresh delays in Russian exports.
PALLADIUM - Firmer with platinum at $198.50/$201.50, up $10.00.
